name: .STYKZ File Extension
summary: Learn about .STYKZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Animation created with Stykz, a free multi-platform stick figure animation program similar to Pivot StickFigure Animator; contains lines and shapes that can be animated frame-by-frame.

content: Individual stick figures can be saved as .STYK files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
